data.title: fibmeasure: Python/Cython module to find the center of back-illuminated optical fibers in metrology images
data.name: fibmeasure
data.description: Python/Cython module to find the centre of back-illuminated optical fibres in metrology images

evidence: "This is a Cython implementation of various techniques to find the centre of circular optical fibre images for astronomical fibre positioning feedback via machine vision cameras."

"A makefile is included in the fibmeasure module folder, which should produce 'measure.so' using the Cython compiler. This is the only part of the module that needs to be imported to do fibre measurements. See 'example.py' for usage."
"Also required for the cross-correlation routines is the 'image_registration' module by Adam Ginsburg, available at https://github.com/keflavich/image_registration"
